casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ramelle Milek LOFTON 143PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2019 William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, for Lofton, Ramelle Milek. Allison A. Angell, Assistant Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of January 2019 by Defendant:

*303"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of January 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 14th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
